select p.id,p.prod_no,p.prod_name,p.type,v.id vendor_id,v.name vendor_name, c.id category_id,c.name category_name,p.description,p.update_by,p.update_time from t_wms_product p left join t_wms_prod_category c on p.category_id = c.id and c.del_flag='1' left join t_wms_vendor v on p.vendor_id = v.id and v.del_flag='1' where p.del_flag ='1'
and p.prod_no like concat('%',#{param.prodNo},'%')
and p.prod_name like concat('%',#{param.prodName},'%')
and p.vendor_id = #{param.vendorId}
order by update_time desc, prod_no asc
